channel.title: Awesome staff we have
channel.description:
/sarcasm
Tarkoff is an illiterate, asshole of a mod.
He can't follow simple rules(that new dominance rule) and tells me I have a bad attitude after he teleported to me while i was 5 steps away from my house, just about to enter because night had just fallen literally 2 seconds ago, and killed me twice for all my stuff.
I quit, bye
/rage

item.title: Awesome staff we have
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:

item.title: Awesome staff we have
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

omgilikepie:

Seriously, there is almost no one that Tarkoff does not get along with…So this tells me that you must have done something to make him mad. I can’t even remember the last time Tarkoff has killed someone lol. Mods can’t teleport, so he either just used an ender pearl like Relm said, or you have bad lag.

he even gets along with me lmfao

Read full topic

item.title: Awesome staff we have
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

[quote=“mironic, post:11, topic:445885”][quote author=asshole_rule link=topic=548751.msg4023034#msg4023034 date=1340149264]

Not even 5 days, it’s been less. And like maybe 15 hours of gameplay.
[/quote] if i tried i could make about 1 diamond block an hour… so your still not new… and calling staff assholes and blamming them for alot wont do you any good since they can just /ban reason: Disrespecting staff

Implying I care that I get banned. I wouldn’t be raging so hard if Tarkoff wasn’t just a total dick in general.

dude… tarkoff is a really nice guy o.o its rare if hes an asshole to someone.
so you must not be a nice guy.[/quote]

I’ve never even communicated with him.

omgilikepie:

Seriously, there is almost no one that Tarkoff does not get along with…So this tells me that you must have done something to make him mad. I can’t even remember the last time Tarkoff has killed someone lol. Mods can’t teleport, so he either just used an ender pearl like Relm said, or you have bad lag.

k

Read full topic

[quote=“xx matty xx, post:4, topic:445885”][quote author=relmitos link=topic=548751.msg4022887#msg4022887 date=1340140598]
To clear things up, Tarkoff didn’t teleport to you, he probably used an enderpearl to catch up with you. Also you’ve been playing for 4 or 5 days now, that doesnt exactly qualify you as being a new player.
[/quote]5 days doesn’t qualify someone as new? This server has been running for at least a year…[/quote]in 5 days i could get about 10 diamond blocks and live of it… so… after 5 days your pretty much a settler and not new.
